directions: Layer 1/4 cup spinach, 1/4 cup beets, 1/4 cup garbanzo beans, and 1/4 cup shredded carrots in each of 4 jars.
Combine olive oil, vinegar, mustard, honey, salt, and pepper in the remaining jar; place lid on jar. Shake until dressing is evenly combined. Pour 1/4 the dressing over each salad.
ingredients: 1 cup garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and rinsed
5 half-pint canning jars with lids and rings
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Salad in a Jar
